a1: Yes, we use the Web Crypto API (crypto.getRandomValues) which provides cryptographically secure random numbers.
q2: Can I generate unique numbers only?
a2: Yes, enable the "Unique" option to ensure no duplicate numbers are generated in your set.
a3: You can set any integer range. The generator supports numbers from negative to positive values.
a4: Yes, enable the "Sorted" option to get your random numbers in ascending order.
